item.title: Karma: Your Personalized Curriculum
item.description: Karma in Wayism Definition Karma is the metaphysical law that acts as a personalized curriculum organizer in the School of Divinity (Earth), specifically designed for each soul’s unique learning needs. The Logic of Karma Logical Structure: IF humans are souls attending the School of Divinity AND each soul has different learning needs based on past experiences THEN a system must exist to provide appropriate lessons THEREFORE Karma organizes experiences tailored to each soul’s requirements RESULT Every life experience becomes an opportunity for growth How Karma Differs from Common Understanding Common Misunderstanding Wayist Understanding Punishment for bad deeds Educational opportunity Reward for good deeds Natural progression Mechanical cause-effect Intelligent curriculum design Debt to be paid Lessons to be learned Practical Example Consider two souls:
